scripts.package:win: npm run build && pkg . --out-path build/win --targets node18-win-x64
scripts.package:mac: npm run build && pkg . --out-path build/mac --targets node18-macos-x64
scripts.package:linux: npm run build && pkg . --out-path build/linux --targets node18-linux-x64
scripts.installer:mac: npm run package:mac && chmod +x create-mac-app.sh && ./create-mac-app.sh && npx create-dmg 'Fraha Pharmacy Server.app' --overwrite && mv 'Fraha Pharmacy Server.dmg' build/mac/
scripts.installer:win: npm run package:win && echo 'Run Inno Setup manually for Windows installer'
scripts.build:all: npm run package && npm run installer:mac
